snippet.title: Isle of Swaps Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
That's right, Isle of Swaps will be releasing on September 27th for PC on Steam!
Grab your binders, its time to battle, swap and open booster packs on your quest to become the Critter Champion of the playground. In this roguelite deckbuilder, take on challenge runs building up your deck through swapping cards and at the end, master the cards unlocking them for use in the tough Championship fights.

Wishlist on Steam to be notified exactly when the game launches: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2294160/Isle_of_Swaps
